basics.name: Mohammad Qasem
basics.summary: Ph.D. candidate specializing in lithium‑ion battery modeling, fast‑charging control, and BMS design. Research focuses on real‑time electrochemical models, digital twins, and AI‑based health estimation; experienced in cell/pack testing and embedded implementation.

work.name: Southern Methodist University (SMU)
highlights: Develop real‑time electrochemical battery models for fast charging.
Implement digital‑twin and AI‑based battery health estimation.
Design battery management systems (BMS) for enhanced durability.

work.name: Gamma Technologies, Inc.
highlights: Developed a Battery Power Limit Controller to optimize charging profiles.
Implemented SoC/SoH estimation algorithms for lithium‑ion batteries.
Designed and validated cell balancing and monitoring systems.

work.name: Illinois Institute of Technology (IIT)
highlights: Conducted research on battery modeling and state estimation algorithms.
Executed comprehensive lithium‑ion cell/pack testing campaigns.
Designed charging controllers and custom PCBs for BMS experimental validation.

work.name: Illinois Institute of Technology (IIT)
highlights: Power Electronics Laboratory.
Hybrid Electric Vehicle Drives Laboratory.

work.name: Princess Sumaya University for Technology (PSUT)
highlights: Taught power electronics: AC–DC, DC–DC, DC–AC converters.
Taught electric machines and transformers; operation and construction.
Led renewable energy labs: on/off‑grid PV design, Li‑ion & lead‑acid batteries in PV systems, wind turbines.

work.name: Princess Sumaya University for Technology (PSUT)
highlights: Renewable Energy Systems, Digital Electronics, Power Electronics, Power System Analysis, Electric Machines.

work.name: Golden Energy for Engineering Service
highlights: Designed and sized solar PV systems.
Designed HVAC, heating under‑floor (HUF), and radiator systems.
Performed solar radiation measurement and evaluation; produced 3D project drawings (SketchUp).

work.name: Electric Distribution Company (EDCO)
highlights: Built electrical control panels for hospitals, industry, and residential applications.
Operated and maintained motors and inverters.

education.summary: Interests: real‑time battery modeling, fast‑charging control, BMS design, aging models, digital twin, AI for battery health estimation, cell and pack testing.
Battery modeling; SoC/SoH estimation; lithium‑ion cell and pack testing.
Power‑plant modeling, meta‑heuristic optimization, control systems, power electronics, renewable energy.

projects.name: Intelligent Sliding Pressure Control for a Supercritical Power Plant
projects.summary: Developed meta‑heuristic‑optimized sliding pressure control; improved response time and efficiency; implemented and validated in MATLAB/Simulink.

projects.name: Large‑Scale PV Integration with the Jordanian Grid
projects.summary: Case study of 300 MW PV plant integration and grid‑level impacts.

projects.name: Course Projects (selected)
projects.summary: Power electronics and embedded systems builds across multiple courses.
highlights: Full‑bridge inverter with LC filter; 3D printer with CNC; adaptive cruise control; Arduino tachometer and motor speed control.
Smart firefighter robot using HCS12 and Arduino.
Home automation with solar panels (MCU Node); solar tracker using PIC microcontroller.
